input:
![c0r9ol5lvw.png](https://img.esteem.ws/c0r9ol5lvw.png) @esteemapp in collaboration with @sndbox is heading awesome [Art Contest](https://steemit.com/esteem/@sndbox/esteem-crypto-art-and-design-challenge-round-10-cc51097f9557f). Have you heard of it? You can win high upvotes and be mentioned in more than 40K followers in account with your work.
You can simply pick image below as a template for your idea and create your own art: ![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc6285dzBL8evCkziEheugCUHV2gub2MQrBFpJAmUP5nc/esteem_art_contest_logo_template.png)
[Check the full rules in @sndbox post](https://steemit.com/esteem/@sndbox/esteem-crypto-art-and-design-challenge-round-10-cc51097f9557f).
### Sketches & Process I've made these sketches in the air again. Was flying from Saint Petersburg to Moscow yesterday. It was just an hour flight and I had 20 minutes allowed to use electronic devices so I've used this time to prepare for the todays post. ![wv91t8wc1s.png](https://img.esteem.ws/wv91t8wc1s.png) Chosen the last one. This is a small whale **eSteem mascot** by the way. I've not drawn illustrations with the background for a long time. Felt I really want to add some stuff for the background so here it is. ![w05z288iid.png](https://img.esteem.ws/w05z288iid.png) ### Coloring As usual I've done this in **Adobe Photoshop** with the help of my Microsoft Surface Pro 2017 small tablet. Starting with simple silouettes, ![wuxhee6lcq.png](https://img.esteem.ws/wuxhee6lcq.png) ![xrt7dzye6y.png](https://img.esteem.ws/xrt7dzye6y.png) ### Final Now I am not pretending for the contest actually. I've made this work to advertise the contest itself. You still have few more days to participate. It would be unfair if I will compete with others because it was my idea to do this contest originally. I wish good luck to everyone and will be upvoting my personal choices for that contest as well to support you with my small rewards too. ![c0r9ol5lvw.png](https://img.esteem.ws/c0r9ol5lvw.png) ----------
This post was created with the help of Steem desktop client [**`eSteem Surfer`**](https://esteem.app)
----------
freelance illustrator **Fil Dunsky** `Portfolio` | `Instagram` | `Behance`
result:
@esteemapp in collaboration with @sndbox is heading awesome Art Contest. Have you heard of it? You can win high upvotes and be mentioned in more than 40K followers in account with your work.

You can simply pick image below as a template for your idea and create your own art:

Check the full rules in @sndbox post.

Sketches & Process

I've made these sketches in the air again. Was flying from Saint Petersburg to Moscow yesterday. It was just an hour flight and I had 20 minutes allowed to use electronic devices so I've used this time to prepare for the todays post.

Chosen the last one. This is a small whale eSteem mascot by the way. I've not drawn illustrations with the background for a long time. Felt I really want to add some stuff for the background so here it is.

Coloring

As usual I've done this in Adobe Photoshop with the help of my Microsoft Surface Pro 2017 small tablet. Starting with simple silouettes,

Final

Now I am not pretending for the contest actually. I've made this work to advertise the contest itself. You still have few more days to participate. It would be unfair if I will compete with others because it was my idea to do this contest originally. I wish good luck to everyone and will be upvoting my personal choices for that contest as well to support you with my small rewards too.

This post was created with the help
of Steem desktop client eSteem Surfer

freelance illustrator Fil Dunsky
Portfolio | Instagram | Behance
